name: HETAS Ltd
description:
HETAS are the official body recognised by Government to approve biomass and solid fuel domestic heating appliances, fuels and services including the registration of competent installers and servicing businesses. Schemes include
HETAS Product Approval
HETAS Competent Persons Registration Scheme
HETAS Approved Chimney Sweeps
HETAS quality Assured Fuel
HETAS Approved Retailers
Microgeneration Certification Scheme covering biomass and solar thermal technologies.
